name: Ultra Polarizing Adventure
description:
Important note - The WebGL build of this game has some issues that do not exist in the download copy of the game!  The downloadable version of the game also allows you to enter a username in the options for the leaderboard!  Thanks!

How fast can you complete all 20 levels?  That is the goal!  

Ultra Polarizing Adventure is a platformer designed for ScoreSpace Jam #18 

The game consists of 20 levels and a clock, how fast can you get through all the levels and get your score in?
